Name: Abort Mode I
checklistText:
<size=22>ABORT MODE I</size>
(PRE-LAUNCH & LAUNCH TO 75,000 FEET)

ABORT INDICATOR: 		RED

1.0 SECONDS: PULL D-RING ON EJECTION SEAT
1.5 SECONDS: HATCH OPEN
2.0 SECOND DELAY: SEATS EJECTED
SEAT SUSTAINER FIRED FOR 2.25 SECONDS
3.0 SECONDS: SEAT-MAN SEPARATION
5.0 SECONDS: MAIN CHUTE OPENS
